start_message: ğŸµ Welcome to Music Bot! I'm your personal music assistant. I can: â€¢ Play music from YouTube â€¢ Manage playback controls â€¢ Organize your music queue â€¢ Support multiple languages Commands: /play [query] - Play music /pause - Pause current track /resume - Resume playback /skip - Skip current track /stop - Stop and leave voice chat /queue - Show music queue /help - Show this help /language - Switch language Use /play with a YouTube URL or search query to get started!
help_message: ğŸµ Music Bot Help Basic Commands: â€¢ /play [URL/query] - Play music from YouTube â€¢ /pause - Pause current track â€¢ /resume - Resume playback â€¢ /skip - Skip to next track â€¢ /stop - Stop playback and leave voice chat â€¢ /queue - Show music queue with pagination â€¢ /language - Switch between English and Arabic â€¢ /help - Show this help message Features: âœ“ High-quality audio streaming âœ“ Smart queue management âœ“ Progress tracking âœ“ Auto-resume after interruptions âœ“ Inline controls with callback buttons âœ“ Multi-language support Tips: â€¢ Use inline buttons for quick controls â€¢ Queue supports pagination for long lists â€¢ Bot will automatically join voice chats â€¢ Assistant will be promoted for voice chat management Made with â¤ï¸ for music lovers
